introduction: SYNOPSISIn the 1930s, the heretical religion 'Pure White' cult utilizes cajolery to recruit unsuspecting and innocent people. As a strictly underground secret group, they take money and fortune from people to abuse it to please the cult leader and also demand that the poor followers offer their daughter to become the leader's mistress. When threatened with national exposure, the leader orders his twelve henchmen to murder 350 followers. Years later, the truth surfaces due to a man named Yoo Gon-ryong. He had been searching for the base of operations to reveal the evil influence of the Pure White cult in accordance with his grandfather's last wishes. He reveals the hideous truth of the murderous group in front of his father, a devout follower, and sister, a concubine of the leader.故事当20世纪30年代，二邪教baekbaekgyo去扩大gyose引诱无知善良的人们用各种奉承。众深奥的地下财富的详尽收集致力于层次yuheungbi和ilsamneunda的罪行，如samneun情妇献给她的钱，而不是追随者的女儿。在此之前，他们的朝圣之旅的罪行随后透露当天是真棒浮桥下的指令来装载了十几个打手salingwi全国出栏一批350名男女信徒。但是，我magak是由一个叫yugonryong透露，几年后，yugonryong hemaetdeon会发现主页根据爷爷将剥离baekbaekgyo的魔掌。他已经揭示了在地方团聚一个哥哥，一个姐姐和他的父亲谢赫的妾杀谢赫的充分程度已成为baekbaekgyo异教徒剥离口罩只能引领世界进入恒人口baekbaekgyo的坩埚。
